event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected resource, the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The number of level 2 cache uncorrectable data errors has exceeded acceptable levels.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The Message ID:   %MSGID% indicates that processor L2 cache is faulty. The nature of the fault does not allow an automated attempt to disable the affected resource. It is recommended that the system administrator contact Sun support and arrange for the replacement of the affected component.

Use the command fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>  with the  <EVENT_ID>  from the console message to locate the faulty component. For this fault, the fault manager identifies each thread in the processor as faulty as shown in the example below. 

# fmdump -v -u 127d0797-7d35-c214-9445-e6a26c2a4fcf
TIME                 UUID                                 SUNW-MSG-ID
Sep 25 14:15:15.9107 127d0797-7d35-c214-9445-e6a26c2a4fcf SUN4V-8000-WJ
   100%  fault.cpu.ultraSPARC-T1.l2data-u

         Problem in: cpu:///cpuid=31/serial=FFFFF228694CB624
            Affects: cpu:///cpuid=31/serial=FFFFF228694CB624
                FRU: hc:///motherboard=0
           Location: MB

   100%  fault.cpu.ultraSPARC-T1.l2data-u

         Problem in: cpu:///cpuid=30/serial=FFFFF228694CB624
            Affects: cpu:///cpuid=30/serial=FFFFF228694CB624
                FRU: hc:///motherboard=0
           Location: MB

                      .
                      .
                      .

   100%  fault.cpu.ultraSPARC-T1.l2data-u

         Problem in: cpu:///cpuid=0/serial=FFFFF228694CB624
            Affects: cpu:///cpuid=0/serial=FFFFF228694CB624
                FRU: hc:///motherboard=0
           Location: MB

Note the FRU called out for each faulty thread is the same. In the example above, the FRU is the motherboard.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: System performance is likely to be affected.
event_registry_properties.name: response
title
event_registry_properties.item: Level 2 cache uncorrectable data errors exceeded acceptable levels
